name: Ball Crash (Rakhaaa)
description:
This Is a beta version of my first game called "Ball Crash",Inspired by a youtuber called Brackeys and i'll do some updates if you guys interested in the game,Thanks 😊

Translation:Ini adalah versi beta dari game pertama gw yang bernama "Ball Crash",Terinsipirasi dari youtuber bernama Brackeys,gw bakal update kalo kalian tertarik sama gamenya,Makasih😊

GAME CONTROLS:

A(Left/Kiri), D(Right/Kanan), S(Slow Down/Memperlambat Laju), SpaceBar(Fly or Jump/Terbang atau Lompat)

notes*:"Fly or jump depends on the level some level doesn't required jump/fly so you can only use the Space Bar button in particular levels"

"This game is not yet developed for mobile games "

~Rakha Putera
